ComicInfo.Title: Cave of the Huxtabites
ComicInfo.Summary:
Things are finally winding down for our heroes, it looks like the Bravest Warriors can finally take a breather...or can they? Could it be that they are in an illusion that just wants them to relax before it breaks and reigns terror on their minds? What if there is a memory donk near by and they just can't remember the mortal peril they are actually in?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Kyle Fewell | 1 | B | Cover B | Kelly Matthews & Nichole Matthews | 2 | C | Cover C | Jason Adams | 3 | D | Cover D | Emily Partridge | 4 |
